name: Cushion Cover
description: Crafted from 100% upcycled materials, this vibrant cushion cover features a stunning multicolor abstract print on the front, bringing a bold pop of color and artistry to any space. Perfect for adding an eco-friendly touch to your decor.

name: Natural Fibre Pot
description: This natural fiber pot is made from sustainable materials, giving your plants a stylish and eco-friendly home. Its earthy texture and organic appeal complement any indoor or outdoor space, adding a touch of nature to your decor.

name: Swastik Diwali Door Hanging
description: Celebrate Diwali with this traditional Swastik door hanging. Made with intricate detailing and designed to bring prosperity to your home, it's perfect for adding a festive and auspicious touch to your entryway.

name: Upcycled Audio Tapes
description: These upcycled audio tapes have been transformed into unique decorative pieces, blending nostalgia with eco-conscious design. Ideal for music lovers and sustainable living advocates alike, they bring a retro vibe to your space.
